page.title: 03Beath Community Centre
page.content: The range of activities is wide in Beath Centre. This range covers photography, keep-fit, swimming, archery and dressmaking. Entry is free but prices for use of the facilities range from Â£3.60 for the swimming pool to Â£2.00 for the gymnasium. The Centre's facilities are available from 6-10 pm on weekdays and from 12_5 pm on a Sunday. From adults to children it is used by about 2471 people and on a Friday night 3371 have the use of the Centre. People travel from as far as Alloa to use the centre. Around 60-70% of the people come from a 10km radius around the Centre. There are 15 people involved with the Centre. Mr Grieve is the head of the Centre. Some outdoor activities include skiing and camping. The Centre is quieter during the Christmas and Summer holidays. .
